pageContext.description: one rivet remains.,  point broken off, butt broken, edge worn.
pageContext.surface: bright metallic surface with many spots of green encrustation.
pageContext.associations: Part of a hoard consisting of 16 flanged celts, 3 daggers, a spearhead + a chisel.

pageContext.collection: British Museum 69 12 15 20,  Given by the Duke of Bedford 1869.
